entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 1:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -43.7°C
Wind: NNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 47.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 47. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 62 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
